expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is Observation).where(id = '${96430b3a-55b6-4b26-8f1d-bb2d0ae5d034-id}').method.where(coding.where(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-NullFlavor' and code = 'OTH' and display) and text.hasValue()).exists()

description.value: Test Server query operation for Observations
Test XIS server to serve Observation resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that the parameters in the request URL are all handled by the server, by inspecting the self link.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Observation resource(s) with code http://snomed.info/sct | 276507005. (bloeddruk)
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Observation that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: 60b7f715-3e30-4cb2-badd-962def709a6a)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Observation
Observation resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/bc-FetusObservation'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/observation-focusSTU3' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is Observation).where(id = '${60b7f715-3e30-4cb2-badd-962def709a6a-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/observation-focusSTU3').value.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'final'
Contains .code with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '276507005' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is Observation).where(id = '${60b7f715-3e30-4cb2-badd-962def709a6a-id}').code.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '276507005' and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is Observation).where(id = '${60b7f715-3e30-4cb2-badd-962def709a6a-id}').subject.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .context with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is Observation).where(id = '${60b7f715-3e30-4cb2-badd-962def709a6a-id}').context.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .valueBoolean 'true'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is Observation).where(id = '${60b7f715-3e30-4cb2-badd-962def709a6a-id}').value.where($this is boolean) = true
